SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.image

Class ColorMatrix

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.matrix.LongMatrix
civitas.celestis.graphics.image.ColorMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrix<Long,LongMatrix>, Collectable<Long>, Listable<Long>, Grid<Long>, Group<Long>, Serializable, Iterable<Long>
public class ColorMatrix extends LongMatrix
A matrix of colors.

Color matrices allocate 64 bits per pixel to represent the color of that pixel. Colors are encoded into the type long using Color8.pack64().

See Also:

      Creates a new matrix.
      Parameters:
      r - The number of rows this matrix has (the height)
      c - The number of columns this matrix has (the width)

      @Nonnull public ColorMatrix get(int r1, int c1, int r2, int c2) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns a sub-grid of this grid. The return value will have a row count of r2 - r1, and a column count of c2 - c1.

    • get

      @Nonnull public ColorMatrix get(@Nonnull Int2 i1, @Nonnull Int2 i2) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns a sub-grid of this grid. The return value will have a row count of i2.x() - i1.x(), and a column count of i2.y() - i1.y().
